channel.title: Installation error: "could not get preferred machine"
channel.description:
I'm installing Whonix for the first time and received this error message:
error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-16.0.5.3.xml error: invalid argument: could not get preferred machine for /usr/bin/qemu-system-x86_64 type=kvm
Not sure what to do, not sure if I missed something.

item.title: Installation error: "could not get preferred machine"
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Installation error: "could not get preferred machine"
